page.title: 10Farm Animals.
page.content: Stubbs Hall Farm is mainly a{pig farm. The farmer,{Mr.Soar,}breeds pigs and fattens them up and sells them at the {market. The sow}is put into a sty just before the piglets are due to be born.The{sows}are kept in crates in order to have their babies. if thay weren't put in crates the piglets would be squashed under the{sow.}When a sow has produced a piglet,the sow is put in to the field and the breeding cycle starts again.{After three weeks {the farmer chops the tails and teeth {off. Then the piglets leave their mother. When they get heavy enough the piglets are taken to{market.
